text: جَنَّـٰتُ عَدۡنٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ

translation.en: Gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. And that is the reward of one who purifies himself
translation.id: (yaitu) surga-surga Aden, yang mengalir di bawahnya sungai-sungai, mereka kekal di dalamnya. Itulah balasan bagi orang yang menyucikan diri
